 29 -class Schedule(object): 

 30      """ 
 31      Transmission schedule. 
 32      """ 
 33   

 34 -    def __init__(self, dataSlotTime, syncSlotTime, dataSlots): 

 35          """ 
 36          Initialise schedule. 
 37   
 38          @param dataSlotTime: Data slot duration (float, s). 
 39          @param syncSlotTime: Synchronisation slot duration (float, s). 
 40          @param dataSlots: List of device IDs indexed by allocated slot. 
 41          """ 
 42          self.dataSlotTime = dataSlotTime 
 43          self.syncSlotTime = syncSlotTime 
 44          self.dataSlots = dataSlots 

 45   
 46      @property 

 47 -    def framePeriod(self): 

 48          """ Duration of one complete frame. """ 
 49          return len(self.dataSlots) * self.dataSlotTime + self.syncSlotTime 

 50   

 51 -    def dataTxSlot(self, id): 

 52          """ Transmission slot number for given device ID. """ 
 53          return self.dataSlots.index(id)

 55 -class SyncPacket(RadioPacket):

 57      Synchronisation packet from master.

 59      @property 

 60 -    def bytes(self): 

 61          return 1

 63 -class DataPacket(RadioPacket): 

 64      """ 
 65      Data packet from slave to master. 
 66   
 67      @ivar source: Source device ID. 
 68      """ 

 69 -    def __init__(self, source, data): 

 70          """ 
 71          Initialise data packet. 
 72          @param source: Source device ID. 
 73          @param data: Payload data. 
 74          """ 
 75          RadioPacket.__init__(self, data) 
 76          self.source = source 

 77   
 78      @property 

 79 -    def bytes(self): 

 80          size = 2 
 81          for key in self.keys(): 
 82              data = self[key] 
 83              if isinstance(data, Quaternion): 
 84                  size += array(data.components).nbytes 
 85              elif isinstance(data, numpy.ndarray): 
 86                  size += data.nbytes 
 87          return size

107 -class MasterMAC(MAC): 

108      """ 
109      Master MAC implementation.

112      @prepend_method_doc(MAC) 

113 -    def __init__(self, radio, timerMux, schedule, frameHandler=None): 

114          """ 
115          @param schedule: L{Schedule} object giving transmission scheduling. 
116          @param frameHandler: Handler function to call at the end of each frame. 
117              The packets received in that frame will be passed as a list. 
118          """ 
119          MAC.__init__(self, radio, timerMux) 
120          self.schedule = schedule 
121          self.frameHandler = frameHandler 
122          self.frameTimer = VirtualTimer(timerMux, self._frameTimerHandler) 
123          self.packets = [] 
124          self.frameTimer.start(self.schedule.framePeriod, repeat=True) 

125   

126 -    def _frameTimerHandler(self): 

127          if self.frameHandler is not None: 
128              self.frameHandler(self.packets) 
129          self.packets = []

132 -    def queuePacket(self, packet): 

133          raise NotImplementedError

135 -    def handleIncomingPacket(self, packet): 

136          if isinstance(packet, DataPacket):

139 -class SlaveMAC(MAC): 

140      """ 
141      Slave MAC implementation. 
142      """ 
143   
144      @prepend_method_doc(MAC) 

145 -    def __init__(self, radio, timerMux, schedule, id): 

146          """ 
147          @param schedule: L{Schedule} object giving transmission scheduling. 
148          @param id: The device ID of this node. 
149          """ 
150          MAC.__init__(self, radio, timerMux) 
151          self.schedule = schedule 
152          self.id = id 
153          self.dataTxSlot = self.schedule.dataTxSlot(self.id) 
154          self.slotTimer = VirtualTimer(timerMux, self._slotTimerHandler) 
155          self.slot = len(self.schedule.dataSlots) 
156          self.txPacket = None 

157   

158 -    def _slotTimerHandler(self): 

159          if self.slot == len(self.schedule.dataSlots): 
160              # End of sync slot, start of first data slot. 
161              self.slot = 0 
162          else: 
163              self.slot += 1 
164   
165          if self.slot == len(self.schedule.dataSlots): 
166              # Start of sync slot. 
167              self.slotTimer.start(self.schedule.syncSlotTime) 
168          else: 
169              self.slotTimer.start(self.schedule.dataSlotTime) 
170   
171          if self.slot == self.dataTxSlot: 
172              # Our transmit slot. 
173              if self.txPacket is not None: 
174                  self.radio.transmit(self.txPacket) 
175                  self.txPacket = None 

176   

177 -    def queuePacket(self, packet): 

178          if isinstance(packet, DataPacket): 
179              self.txPacket = packet 
180          else: 
181              raise ValueError 

182   

183 -    def handleIncomingPacket(self, packet): 

184          if isinstance(packet, SyncPacket): 
185              self.slotTimer.start(self.schedule.syncSlotTime/2)

208 -    def _auxSlots(self, sequence, id):

217 -    def auxSlot(self, source, dest):

240 -    def _slotTimerHandler(self):

251 -    def _auxSlotTimerHandler(self):

259 -    def queueAuxPacket(self, packet):
